00020 #ifndef RDK2_GEOMETRY_POINT3
00021 #define RDK2_GEOMETRY_POINT3
00022 
00023 #include "point2.h"
00024 
00025 namespace RDK2 { namespace Geometry {
00026 
00027 template <typename Numeric>
00028 class Point3 : public Point2<Numeric> {
00029 public:
00030     Numeric z;
00031     
00032     Point3() : Point2<Numeric>(), z(0) { }
00033     Point3(Numeric x, Numeric y, Numeric z) : Point2<Numeric>(x, y), z(z) { }
00034     Point3(const Point3<Numeric>& p) : Point2<Numeric>(p.x, p.y), z(p.z) { }
00035         
00036     inline Point3 operator-(const Point3<Numeric>& p) const { 
00037         return Point3(this->x - p.x, this->y - p.y, z - p.z); }
00038     inline Point3 operator+(const Point3<Numeric>& p) const { 
00039         return Point3(this->x + p.x, this->y + p.y, z + p.z); }
00040 
00041     inline Point3 operator*(const Numeric& n) const { return Point3(this->x * n, this->y * n, z * n); }
00042     
00043     inline Numeric operator*(const Point3& p) const { return this->x * p.x + this->y * p.y + z * p.z; }
00044     inline bool    operator==(const Point3& p) const { return this->x == p.x && this->y == p.y && z == p.z; }
00045     inline bool    operator!=(const Point3& p) const { return !(p == *this); }
00046     
00048     inline Point3<Numeric> cross(const Point3<Numeric>& p) const { 
00049         return Point3<Numeric>(this->y*p.z - z*p.y, z*p.x - this->x*p.z, this->x*p.y - this->y*p.x);
00050     }
00051     
00053     inline Numeric mod() const { return sqrt(mod2()); }
00054     
00056     inline Numeric mod2() const { return this->x * this->x + this->y *this-> y + this->z * this->z; }
00057     
00058     inline Numeric distTo(const Point3<Numeric>& p) const { return ((*this) - p).mod(); }
00059     
00060     std::string toString() const
00061     {
00062         std::ostringstream oss;
00063         oss << "(" << this->x << "," << this->y << ")";
00064         return oss.str();
00065     }
00066 };
00067 
00068 }} // ns
00069 
00070 #endif
